Articles.Content:
Hi,

New member here!

I've been playing for a few weeks now and have been loving every minute of it. My achievements so far (in order) are...

  • big explosion
  • successful orbit
  • crashed into the mun
  • orbit the mun
  • fly into the sun
  • spacewalk
  • crash into Minmus
  • crash into the moon and survive
  • land on the moon
  • land on minmus
  • land a rover on the moon

Some of those were intentional.

My next project is a combined lander/rover that can be landed on the moon which I can then use to roam around and pick up all the castaways that I have there.

Welcome to the community twelveways

Wow, lots of accomplishments in the game already, well done, can we see pics?

Have fun rescuing your Kerbals, and fly safe!
